title: Fruit and chicken curry
ingredients: ['4 skinless chicken breast fillets, cut into 1/2" strips', '1 mango, cut into chunks', '1/2 a pineapple, cored and cut into chunks', '1 inch piece fresh root ginger, chopped', '1 tablespoon flour', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 shallots or small onions, chopped', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '200ml chicken stock', '100ml yoghurt', '2 tablespoons desiccated coconut']
